word: Seek to be spiritually minded. We are doing work for eternity. Mary, be an example. We love you as one of our children and I wish so much that you and John may prosper. Be of good courage. Trust in the Lord at all times. He will be your stronghold and your deliverer.--Letter 5, 1861, p. 2. (To Mary Loughborough, June 6, 1861.)
